Package app.src.core

package app.src.core
Core package, contains The classes that define the Gameloop.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    app.src
    Source package, contains everything to run the Mainclass in app.
    app.src.resources
    Resource package, contains all resources.
    app.src.scenes
    Scene package, contains classes to create and handle different Scenes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    Handles Player input
    Gameloop
    Handles Events regarding the gameloop.
    Renderer
    Renders the game view to the screen
